title: Get Help!
content: Use `command -h` or `?command` to get help card. For example, use ?type to find out about the "type" command.

title: Keep it Simple!
content: Most raid commands can be accessed by their first three letters. Some can even be access by their first letter. For example, why type out `!raid` when you can just use `!r`?

title: Don't play and drive!
content: Simply type "d" in a raid channel to indicate you are driving.

title: Codes and Privacy
content: Your code will not show if you have it set to hide in your privacy settings except for when you invoke a command to show it. In other words, you can show your code using `code`, but other's cannot see your code using `code yourname`.

title: What's that command again?
content: Forgot that command for the bajillionth time?  Simply enter a question mark in a raid channel and hit return to get a list.
